net.anymeta
Class AnyMetaAPI

java.lang.Object
  net.anymeta.AnyMetaAPI

public class AnyMetaAPI
extends java.lang.Object

Main API access class. Implements synchronous access to an AnyMeta site.

AnyMetaAPI

public AnyMetaAPI(java.lang.String entrypoint,
                  java.lang.String ckey,
                  java.lang.String csec,
                  java.lang.String tkey,
                  java.lang.String tsec)
Create a AnyMetaAPI instance by specifying the entry point and OAuth credentials. It is often easier to use the "fromRegistry" method to separate your code and your OAuth secrets.

Parameters:
entrypoint -
ckey -
csec -
tkey -
tsec -

fromRegistry

public static AnyMetaAPI fromRegistry(java.lang.String identifier)
                               throws AnyMetaRegistryException
Load a AnyMetaAPI object from the registry.

Parameters:
identifier - The registry identifier.
Returns:
A valid AnyMetaAPI object which can be used to access the site.
Throws:
AnyMetaRegistryException

doMethod

public java.lang.Object doMethod(java.lang.String method,
                                 java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> args)
                          throws AnyMetaException

Parameters:
